All,

 

I am currently testing a project by executing TestCase =
classes using an
ant JUnit task.  One test case class makes use of JaxRPC a=
nd requires
XercesImpl.jar for execution.  When I add XercesImpl.jar to the=
 running
classpath, I receive the following exception during test execution=
 (I
apologize for the long stack trace, but I wanted to get the meat of it
=
in there - it's at the bottom of this message).  The java process
executing=
 the tasks hangs after printing this stack trace and never
seems to return.=


 

I have ensure that the xercesImpl.jar within ant's lib directory match=
es
the one in my classpath (I copied it over my existing JAR).  I've also
t=
ried adding ant's version to the running classpath.  The fact that
there ar=
e two copies of the JAR does not seem to be the problem.
